embed: <object width="560" height="315"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/DNRJwENqEUY?version=3&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/DNRJwENqEUY?version=3&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="560" height="315" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
title: Advanced matplotlib tutorial with library author John Hunter
description:
John's tutorial will focus on broader topics concerning a wide set of users,
including:

  * customization 
  * configuration 
  * event handling 
  * interacting with figures 
  * tips & tricks
summary:
In this video tutorial from the 2012 PyData Workshop, John Hunter, author of
matplotlib is going to give you some advanced insight into the plotting
library.
